trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event of a <xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 처리 하는 메서드를 나타냅니다는 **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** 의 이벤트는 <xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The FormsAuthenticationEventHandler delegate is defined for the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>클래스</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> 의 이벤트</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> 에 대해 FormsAuthenticationEventHandler 대리자 정의

trans-unit.source: You can access the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> class by specifying a subroutine named **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: 에 액세스할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>의 이벤트는 <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>라는 서브루틴을 지정 하 여 클래스 **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** ASP.NET 응용 프로그램의 Global.asax 파일에.</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event is raised during the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> event.

The <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> constructs a <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs> object using the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> and passes it to the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>생성는 <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs>현재 사용 하 여 <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>에 전달 된 **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** 이벤트.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs> object supplied to the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: 사용할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>속성은 <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs>개체에 제공 되는 **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** 설정 하는 이벤트는 <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>현재 <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>을 사용자 지정 <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>개체.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property during the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the identity supplied by the forms authentication ticket in the cookie or URL is used.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 값을 지정 하지 않으면는 <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>하는 동안 속성에서 **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** 이벤트, 쿠키 또는 URL에서 폼 인증 티켓에서 제공한 id에 사용 됩니다.</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: The **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is only raised when the authentication <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> and the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> is an active HTTP module for the application.
trans-unit.target: **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** 이벤트는만 발생 시기 인증 <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A>로 설정 되어 <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode>및 <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>는 응용 프로그램에 대 한 활성 HTTP 모듈.</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A>
